nodes.text: The mountain poachers were a group of poachers that was active on the planet Naboo at the time of the Galactic Civil War. The poachers included beings from various species, including Humans, Bith, Rodians, Bothans and Aqualish.
Their base of operations was a bunker in the mountain wilderness many kilometers south-east of the Lake Retreat. They had trained narglatches to aid them during their hunts.
